short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Find the most commonly used colors on any site! Creates a palette of HEX and RGBA values.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Find the top 6 most commonly used colors on any site! Creates a palette of HEX and RGB values. Clicking on one of the colors will copy the HEX value to your clipboard.
